title: Ep. 915 Another Disastrous Day for the Democrats
description:
In this episode I address the complete collapse of the discredited Russian collusion hoax and the pathetic response by the Democrats. I also address the pending government shutdown, the proposed budget deal, and how President Trump can claim a victory. 
 
News Picks:
The Democrats, and their media pals, are losing their minds as their collusion hoax entirely collapses.
 
What are the Democrats going to do next now that their collusion hoax is collapsing? 
 
The liberal meat police have arrived.
 
The national debt is exploding.
 
The Senate will vote on the ridiculous “Green New Deal.” 
 
The Democrats don’t care about immigration, they care about politically defeating President Trump.
 
How President Trump can box in the Democrats on the budget deal.
 
Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
